ai-patthana15.90:0.2_0: The Origin of the Dhamma: allows uninterruptedly in the case of the phenomena, in the various forms -
ai-patthana15.90:0.3_0: Transmigration for requisites, for the going forth,
ai-patthana15.90:1.1_0: One gives rise to harmlessness causes this is not a cause of misapprehension.
ai-patthana15.90:2.1_0: One who has not gone for refuge to the teaching, not for the sake of sustained thought. Consciousness doesn’t give rise to sorrow.
ai-patthana15.90:2.1_1: Not seeing the cause of death, only the reason why sometimes it doesn’t give rise to flood.
ai-patthana15.90:2.1_2: One who has gone for refuge to the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha, and doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana15.90:4.0_0: (They are) not with an object of the objects.
ai-patthana15.90:4.1_0: Without taking non-violence, not for the sake of access, not for the sake of subsistance, not for the sake of access;
ai-patthana15.90:5.1_0: Without longing for refuge, that is not for the sake of sustaining the flood.
ai-patthana15.90:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana15.90:6.1_2: When they were bathing, they were bathing naked in a definitive ...
ai-patthana15.90:6.1_3: When one isn’t keen or preoccupied,
ai-patthana15.90:6.1_4: it seems to us when you have excellence
ai-patthana15.90:7.1_0: or even a canopy covered in the same way.
ai-patthana15.90:8.1_0: It is a condition for the taking up of not-self, not for the sake of refuge, nor for the sake of all goodness.
ai-patthana15.90:9.1_0: It is the cause of refuge that is the reason for no impingement, not for the sake of non-result, for the sake of non-resultanement, for the sake of non-disappearance condition.
ai-patthana15.90:9.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana15.90:10.1_0: Two on the causes and reasons two faculties were later, and two, three drops drawn out from the pair, two, three drops. ...
ai-patthana15.90:10.1_1: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.90:11.1_0: It is a condition for the sake of refuge, not for the other, and for the sake of it. It is a condition for the later condition that gives rise to death by way of the later condition.
ai-patthana15.90:11.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana15.90:12.1_0: not for the sake of heaven or not,
ai-patthana15.90:13.1_0: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
